content: **this design is a premium pattern a free version of this pattern is also available on my blog the paid premium version offers a tidy and neatly formatted pdf digital download that is ad-free and printer friendly ** > click here to join the sweet bee > crochet facebook group 1 we d love > to see your finished washcloth the lemon peel stitch has some great texture with the use of the single and double_crochet stitches i ve added an extra eye catching accent with row of crossed double_crochet stitches to make this washcloth pattern extra textured and pretty special stitch tutorials and labeled photos are included **inside the pattern you will find ** - detailed written instructions - clear photos - special stitch tutorials - required tools approximate yardage required **materials needed ** - approximately 120 yards of worsted weight cotton yarn i used wecrochet dishie in the kenai and butterscotch colourways - 4mm hook - yarn needle - scissors - measuring tape - stitch markers **this pattern has been tested so you can feel confident in your purchase please note this is a digital file and not a finished product there will be no refunds on digital products ** 1 https //www facebook com/groups/sweetbeecrochet
